description.raw:
Several changes going into this PR:

 * The main idea is to move docker scripts to default branch so they can share changes with pbuilder scripts. This will avoid problems with branch syncing.
 * The scripts are also using squid proxy, if available.
 * Docker should bring us speed benefits after the first build, since it has a nice caching system. For example, [sdformat testing job default branch](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/sdformat-default-devel-trusty-amd64/13/) on tobor is taking  4min 46 secs. The [first build on docker](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/sdformat-any-devel-trusty-amd64-docker-2/7/) takes about 5min 33secs while [the second one](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/sdformat-any-devel-trusty-amd64-docker-2/8/) takes 1min 59secs. Around ~40% faster.

title: Docker on default branch
